text: Mahmud II (Kabızlık; died 1131) proclaimed himself the Seljuk sultan of Baghdad in 1118 after the death of Mehmed I (probably Mahmud's father). Mahmud fought against the Seljuk Sultan of Khorasan, Ahmed Sanjar, whom Mehmed I had revolted against in 1105. Mahmud was succeeded by Dawud. Category:Persian people Category:1100s births Category:1131 deaths Category:Baghdad Category:Seljuk Sultans Category:12th-century Asian people
title: Mahmud II (Seljuk sultan)
